modernize-use-integer-sign-comparison.description:
Description

Replace comparisons between signed and unsigned integers with their safe
C++20
std::cmp_*
alternative, if available.

The check provides a replacement only for C++20 or later, otherwise
it highlights the problem and expects the user to fix it manually.

Examples of fixes created by the check:

unsigned
int
func
(
int
a
,
unsigned
int
b
)
{
return
a
==
b
;
}

becomes

#include
<utility>
unsigned
int
func
(
int
a
,
unsigned
int
b
)
{
return
std
::
cmp_equal
(
a
,
b
);
}
modernize-use-integer-sign-comparison.option:
Static analysis (Clang-Tidy) options are configured via .clang-tidy file.

Options
IncludeStyle
A string specifying which include-style is used,
llvm
or
google
.
Default is
llvm
.
EnableQtSupport
Makes C++17
q20::cmp_*
alternative available for Qt-based
applications. Default is
false
.
